m_list.m_dialog: This world is dangerous, and you need to decide how to deal with the monsters enhabiting this world.
The Warrior is a person who focuses on brute force and uses their weapons to slay their foes.
The mage is a person who focuses on using the abilities stored in their weapons to slay their foes.
Lastly, the Hunter is a person who relies on their speed, to out maneuver their foes.
Fortunitely for you, Inkman, you don't have to stay as one class. You can decide, and change your mind later!
